title: Installation issue: hpx5
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install hpx5
```
All versions I tried failed with the same error message. 
```console
==> Error: FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'hpx'

/opt/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_systems/autotools.py:216, in autoreconf:
        213        tty.warn('*********************************************************')
        214        tty.warn('* If the default procedure fails, consider implementing *')
        215        tty.warn('*        a custom AUTORECONF phase in the package       *')
  >>    216        tty.warn('*********************************************************')
        217        with working_dir(self.configure_directory):
        218            m = inspect.getmodule(self)
        219            # This line is what is needed most of the time
```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a
Linux b002 3.10.0-693.21.1.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Wed Mar 7 19:03:37 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
``` 
and

```commandline
% uname -a
Darwin ada 19.3.0 Darwin Kernel Version 19.3.0: Thu Jan  9 20:58:23 PST 2020; root:xnu-6153.81.5~1/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64
```

### Additional information

I've tried removing `configure_directory = "hpx"` from `hpx5/package.py`, but this results in further issues during the autoreconf.
